name: Abandoned Building Quest
description:
Explore an abandoned building, make the right decisions to increase your chances of survival, and fight strange enemies in turn-based combat that also requires fast reflexes! (Also, consider saving your game often.)

I made this game for NaNoRenO 2016 using the Ren'py visual novel engine, but it's more of an adventure RPG sort of thing.

Listen to and get the chiptune-style soundtrack I composed for this game on Bandcamp.

You can see what else I'm doing on Twitter.
